Blog.post: urlLink My third visit to Gusgen Mines, it seems that each time I visit here I die. This time it was courtesy of a notorious monster, "Smothered Smith". I'll get my revenge someday... urlLink
urlLink Killed the Dragon in 2 mins 30 secs with 4 party members ( smn, smn, thf and blm ) urlLink Screenshots - Pictures of Lion and Ayame. urlLink
urlLink Getting ready to fight Bastok Dragon. ( smn, smn, blm, thf ) ^_^ I can never refuse a mithra asking for help. urlLink

urlLink Visited San d'Oria last night and I was trying to get Drain Quest. Unlucky for me I only have Level 2 fame and the quest requires lvl 3, so now I'm doing chores for the people of San d'Oreo to increase my fame. urlLink
urlLink Leveling in Crawlers Nest with my static group ( 45thf, 45whm, 45smn, 45pld ) urlLink
urlLink Yes! We defeated Porphyrion and got the keys Rank 4 now and 5k richer ^_^ (Party: whm45, smn45, pld45) urlLink
urlLink Doing Bastok Mission 3-3 ^_^ if we survive I'll be rank 4! urlLink
urlLink Shopping in the gobbie shop while visiting Jeuno. urlLink

urlLink This is the first time I ever saw a Ballista match, Khamen and I wanted to participate but the level cap was 50. It looks like lots of fun, although when I saw that poor Taru getting beat up, I kinda believe there is no room for whm's in this event. urlLink
urlLink Bad link at Crawlers Nest! At least now I can upload my screenshots while I'm still on the game! urlLink
A very sad but enlightening story to all adventurers in Vana'diel, if you don't /cry after reading this, then you have no heart!!! LOL urlLink A Linkshell's Story
urlLink Enjoying the fireworks display for " Summer Fest ", I envy those people wearing their yukata's I wish I participated on this quest. urlLink
urlLink Tornadoes in Altepa Desert, the most I've seen is two, how about you? urlLink

My first ever blog and my first ever post... On this blog I shall chronicle the adventures of FujikoFujio of Laksmhi who hails from the kingdom of Bastok. I will share to you my feelings, my adventures and stories of other adventurers that I meet in Vana'diel.

Thanks to Ankiu, our Linkshell now has its own bulletin board, hopefully in the future we can have our own website too. urlLink the-harbingers.com More power to the Harbingers! /em does the Harbinger salute!

urlLink -_- omg I was so tired I fell asleep on our party last night. Alric said they all got killed by a cactuar. Now I find myself in some strange land, they said we were going to level in Quicksand Caves. This reminds me of Africa, that thing almost looks like a giraffe. I feel sorry for my group, I'm such a terrible white mage. I should have told them I was too tired. urlLink

Finally the sequel to NFSU is supposed to be released this November, urlLink NFSU2 . I can't wait for the days to pass by. This is so far the only game that can make me stop playing urlLink Final Fantasy XI , I just sit around, grab the steering and shift into high gear! BTW, they also mentioned that urlLink Brooke Burke will be on this game ^_^
urlLink Rassane is all fired up to kick some leapin lizzy a$$ urlLink
urlLink Helping LS members (Wintercastle and Moiraine) get rank 4. That thing may look scary but we took it down in less than a minute. Thanks to Ramai(Pld50) and Hukai (Sam50) urlLink

urlLink Castle Oztroja, I visited this place last night, I saw lots of Yagudo's. I didn't go to the second floor coz I think most of the people there were all above lvl 50. I also saw the remains of a giant beast in Meriphataud Mountains. It stretched across the land, what a mighty beast this bones must have belonged too. I only wish that he died of old age and not against something mightier than he is! urlLink

urlLink Here's a very cute Taru we met by the Fumaroles. When? I can't remember. I remember we fought side-by-side against crabs, bees and gobs. We gained exp and leveled our jobs. On that day I also gained a friend, and today he helped me obtain my ranger job. Thanks Bro! urlLink

urlLink Got the last key we needed from Ghelsba, I had fun doing Lvl 2 Renkei with Flo, we were doing Frost Bite > Brainshaker = Fragmentation and I'd do Magic Burst: Thunder . Getting those keys I say were real easy. And my theory is that the more SC and MB you do, the more drops you'll get. Just a theory though. urlLink
urlLink Helping a fellow LS member find her keys. We got the one in Giddeus and now on our way to Palborough Mines. urlLink
urlLink What a beautiful rainbow! Saw this in La Theine Plateau with Brolijr, we were doing summoner quest. urlLink
